code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [Infra_EtcdCluster]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[Infra_WorkerNode]
        L[Infra_WorkerNode]
        V[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        H[Infra_RedisCache]
        T[Infra_RedisCache]
        R[Infra_IngressController]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[Infra_LoadBalancer]

    subgraph Metrics[Infra_RedisCache]
        MS[Infra_RedisCache]
        MF[Infra_IngressController]
        MR[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        MP[Infra_RedisCache]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        C[Infra_EtcdCluster] -->|reuse| RU[Infra_WorkerNode]
        C -->|clean| NI[Infra_RedisCache]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[Infra_RedisCache] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
